insert into op_jczx_feed_result_info ( op_jczx_feed_result_info_id, base_id, entrust_order_item_id, entrust_order_sample_id, entrust_order_id, clmh, m0, m1, m2, m3, m4, x, x1, upper_m1, m, cp, v2, xhgh, w, ldh, ca, ee, ggh, p, a, zxph, zjl, gh, compare_clmh, compare_m0, compare_m1, compare_m2, compare_m3, compare_m4, compare_x, compare_x1, compare_upper_m1, compare_xhgh, compare_m, compare_cp, compare_v2, compare_w, compare_ee, compare_ldh, compare_ca, compare_ggh, compare_a, compare_zxph, compare_p, compare_zjl, compare_a0, compare_a1, compare_a2, compare_syxgdaz, compare_yyh, compare_g, compare_syzwschl, compare_dfhl, test_date, average, absolute_difference, f, dry_time, test_user, check_user, test_user_signature, check_user_signature, xyzhl, jcstj, dcytj, jcjg, syxgdaz, c, ypzxxhl, a0, a1, a2, yyh, n, g, dfhl, syzwschl, ycstj, xsytj, yxxc, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, fgwz, csf, v1, compare_v1, compare_c, v, v0, compare_v, compare_v0, remark, file_id, file_url, jcjgfw, is_reset ) values

mapper.update: update op_jczx_feed_result_info set delete_id=op_jczx_feed_result_info_id ,update_time=now(), update_by=#{updateUserId} where op_jczx_feed_result_info_id = #{opJczxFeedResultInfoId}
update op_jczx_feed_result_info set is_reset='1' ,update_time=now(), update_by=#{updateUserId} where op_jczx_feed_result_info_id = #{opJczxFeedResultInfoId}
update op_jczx_feed_result_info set delete_id=op_jczx_feed_result_info_id ,update_time=now(), update_by=#{updateUserId} where base_id = #{baseId}
mapper.select: select i.*,s.sample_no,s.name sample_name from op_jczx_feed_result_info i left join op_feed_entrust_order_sample s on s.op_feed_entrust_order_sample_id=i.entrust_order_sample_id where i.base_id=#{opJczxFeedResultBaseId} and i.delete_id='0' and i.is_reset ='0' order by s.sample_no asc

select i.*,s.sample_no,s.name sample_name,bi.item_name,bi.bs_labtest_items_id,bi.item_code from op_jczx_feed_result_info i left join op_feed_entrust_order_sample s on s.op_feed_entrust_order_sample_id=i.entrust_order_sample_id and s.is_delete='0' left join op_feed_entrust_order_item fi on fi.op_feed_entrust_order_item_id=i.entrust_order_item_id and fi.is_delete='0' left join bs_labtest_items bi on bi.bs_labtest_items_id=fi.item_id and bi.is_delete='0' where i.base_id=#{opJczxFeedResultBaseId} and i.delete_id='0' order by s.sample_no desc,bi.item_name desc
mapper.update: update op_jczx_feed_result_info set check_user=#{checkUser} where base_id = #{baseId} and delete_id='0'
update op_jczx_feed_result_info set test_user=#{testUser} where base_id = #{baseId} and delete_id='0'
mapper.select:
select * from op_jczx_feed_result_info b where delete_id = '0' and entrust_order_sample_id in
#{item}

select * from op_jczx_feed_result_info b where delete_id = '0' and entrust_order_item_id='初水分' and entrust_order_sample_id in
#{item}

select i.*,s.sample_no,s.name as sample_name from op_jczx_feed_result_info i left join op_feed_entrust_order_sample s on s.op_feed_entrust_order_sample_id=i.entrust_order_sample_id and s.is_delete = '0' where s.sample_no = #{sampleNo} and i.delete_id = '0' and i.entrust_order_item_id = #{entrustOrderItemId}

select i.*,s.sample_no,s.name as sample_name,li.item_name from op_jczx_feed_result_info i left join op_feed_entrust_order_sample s on s.op_feed_entrust_order_sample_id=i.entrust_order_sample_id and s.is_delete = '0' left join op_feed_entrust_order_item oi on oi.op_feed_entrust_order_item_id =i.entrust_order_item_id and oi.is_delete='0' left join bs_labtest_items li on li.bs_labtest_items_id=oi.item_id and li.is_delete='0' where s.sample_no = #{sampleNo} and i.delete_id = '0'

select i.*,s.sample_no,s.name as sample_name,li.item_name,li.bs_labtest_items_id from op_jczx_feed_result_info i left join op_jczx_feed_result_base b on b.op_jczx_feed_result_base_id = i.base_id left join op_feed_entrust_order_sample s on s.op_feed_entrust_order_sample_id=i.entrust_order_sample_id and s.is_delete = '0' left join op_feed_entrust_order_item oi on oi.op_feed_entrust_order_item_id =i.entrust_order_item_id and oi.is_delete='0' left join bs_labtest_items li on li.bs_labtest_items_id=oi.item_id and li.is_delete='0' where s.sample_no = #{sampleNo} and b.status !='5' and i.is_reset='0' and i.delete_id = '0'
mapper.update: update op_jczx_feed_result_info set entrust_order_sample_id=#{newSampleId} where entrust_order_sample_id=#{oldSampleId} and delete_id='0'
update op_jczx_feed_result_info set entrust_order_item_id=#{newItemId} where entrust_order_item_id=#{oldItemId} and delete_id='0'
